title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building AI That Customers Actually Trust (AIM2203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建客户真正信任的 AI (AIM2203)
abstract: AI faces a trust crisis: executives see poor returns while customers find no value in AI-powered customer service and increasingly distrust companies with their data. For product teams navigating boardroom pressure and customer backlash, this creates an urgent challenge. Trust is the currency of AI innovation. This session reveals Qualtrics' playbook for converting AI skeptics into advocates, covering the customer insights that predict AI success and when feedback becomes competitive advantage. Discover where leading companies achieve measurable AI value in customer experience, learn security-first frameworks that build customer confidence, and gain insights from companies successfully building value with AI agents. This presentation is brought to you by Qualtrics, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: AI 面临信任危机：高管们看到糟糕的回报，而客户在 AI 驱动的客户服务中找不到价值，并且越来越不信任公司处理他们的数据。对于面临董事会压力和客户反弹的产品团队来说，这构成了紧迫的挑战。信任是 AI 创新的货币。本次会议揭示了 Qualtrics 将 AI 怀疑者转化为支持者的策略手册，涵盖预测 AI 成功的客户洞察以及反馈何时成为竞争优势。了解领先公司在客户体验中实现可衡量 AI 价值的领域，学习建立客户信心的安全优先框架，并从成功利用 AI 代理构建价值的公司中获得洞察。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Qualtrics 为您呈现。
